item.description:
The August book was recommended by an employee of Barnes and Nobel. We went for some light reading but I hope more make it to the Sugust meeting so we can select the next series of books to read.



"Twilight", Stephanie Meyer

As a plus if you like the book the author will be at the store on the 1st of August releasing the next book of the series.


Hope to see a lot of you there!
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be sitting by the sign with a notebook!

group.name: The Hartford Area Book Club Meetup Group

item.name: August Meeting
